No Exit (Europe).name: No Exit
No Exit (Europe).original_desc: No Exit is a side-view martial arts beat 'em up, similar in style to IK+. Each fight must be won within a time limit. You can specify your character's ability quite precisely, trading off Vivacity against Efficiency and Resistance against Strength. Your c
No Exit (Europe).desc: 《No Exit》是一款側視格鬥格鬥遊戲，風格與 IK+ 類似。每場戰鬥都必須在限定時間內獲勝。您可以非常精確地指定角色的能力，在活力與效率、抵抗力與力量之間進行權衡。你的c

Barbarian 2 (Europe).name: Barbarian 2 - The Dungeon Of Drax
Barbarian 2 (Europe).original_desc: Barbarian II features only a single-player mode, in which the player assumes the role of either sword-wielding Princess Mariana or the titular savage, who is armed with a battleaxe. Their common quest is to pursue the evil wizard Drax, who has fled to his dungeon hideout after his defeat in the first game. The player characters battle their way through an inhospitable wasteland, a system of caves, and a dungeon before facing Drax in his inner sanctum for a showdown.
Barbarian 2 (Europe).desc: 《野蠻人 II》只有單人模式，玩家扮演揮舞劍的瑪麗安娜公主或手持戰斧的名義上的野蠻人。他們的共同任務是追捕邪惡巫師德拉克斯，他在第一場比賽中失敗後逃到了他的地牢藏身處。玩家角色在荒涼的荒地、洞穴系統和地牢中奮力殺出一條血路，然後在德拉克斯的內部密室中展開決戰。

Batman the Movie (Europe).name: Batman The Movie
Batman the Movie (Europe).original_desc: The game consists of five stages based on events from the movie. Each stage has a time limit and a health gauge (represented by Batman's face turning into the Joker's), with Batman losing a life if he runs out. The 5 levels offer different gameplay.
Batman the Movie (Europe).desc: 該遊戲由五個基於電影事件的階段組成。每個階段都有時間限制和健康指標（以蝙蝠俠的臉變成小丑的臉來表示），如果用完，蝙蝠俠就會失去生命。5 個級別提供不同的遊戲玩法。

Burning Rubber (Europe).name: Burnin' Rubber
Burning Rubber (Europe).original_desc: Burnin' Rubber is the game that was included with every Plus and GX4000 on a cartridge, in a bid to showcase the Plus machine's new hardware abilities. Therefore it was quite popular, although it did not really show off the Plus capabilities, being an early title and all. Despite that, it wasn't a bad game on its own and is considered one of the good racing games on the Amstrad.
Burning Rubber (Europe).desc: Burnin' Rubber 是每台 Plus 和 GX4000 的卡帶中都包含的遊戲，旨在展示 Plus 機器的新硬件功能。因此，它非常受歡迎，儘管它並沒有真正展示 Plus 功能，只是一個早期的遊戲而已。儘管如此，它本身並不是一款糟糕的遊戲，並且被認為是 Amstrad 上最好的賽車遊戲之一。

Copter 271 (Europe).name: Copter 271
Copter 271 (Europe).original_desc: An army of Martians is attacking Earth and humanity is threatened with complete extinction. The player has been summoned by the army general and is given the task to fight the enemy in the latest helicopter, Copter 271. Copter 271 is a vertically scrollin
Copter 271 (Europe).desc: 一支火星人軍隊正在攻擊地球，人類面臨徹底滅絕的威脅。玩家受到陸軍將軍的召喚，並被賦予了乘坐最新型直升機 Copter 271 與敵人作戰的任務。 Copter 271 是一款垂直捲軸遊戲

Crazy Cars 2 (Europe).name: Crazy Cars 2
Crazy Cars 2 (Europe).original_desc: Racing game through four states of the USA driving a Ferrari F40. You have a given amount of time to reach a distant city. Using the added map you have to find the best way by yourself through the junctions. While there are no other private cars the police tries to stop you using patrol cars and road blocks.
Crazy Cars 2 (Europe).desc: 駕駛法拉利 F40 穿越美國四個州的賽車遊戲。你有一定的時間到達一個遙遠的城市。使用添加的地圖，您必須自己找到通過路口的最佳路線。雖然沒有其他私家車，但警察會嘗試使用巡邏車和路障來阻止您。

Dick Tracy (Europe).name: Dick Tracy
Dick Tracy (Europe).original_desc: Dick Tracy is a tie in to the 1990 movie adaptation of the classic comic strip, staring Warren Beatty and Madonna.  This is a side scrolling action game, where you control Dick Tracy as he moves through five stages, shooting gangsters with an assortment o
Dick Tracy (Europe).desc: 《迪克·特雷西》改編自 1990 年經典漫畫電影，由沃倫·比蒂和麥當娜主演。這是一款橫向捲軸動作遊戲，你控制迪克·特雷西穿越五個階段，用各種各樣的武器射擊歹徒。

Enforcer (Europe).name: Enforcer, The
Enforcer (Europe).original_desc: Your job is to gun down dozens of bad guys as they pop up from beind trash cans (that's American dustbins), peer out of windows. The game is played Operation Wolf style, though the screen won't move - you have to kill a pre-determined number of goons before you can progress any further down the street. There are also nice little bonus levels in between locations, involving loads of bottles of booze and some blokeys trying frantically to pack it. Your job here is to shoot the whiskey before it gets packed.
Enforcer (Europe).desc: 你的任務是射殺幾十個從垃圾桶（美國的垃圾箱）後面跳出來的壞人，向窗外張望。遊戲採用狼行動風格，儘管屏幕不會移動——你必須殺死預定數量的暴徒，然後才能繼續沿著街道前進。地點之間還有一些不錯的小獎勵關卡，其中包括大量的酒瓶和一些瘋狂地試圖打包它的傢伙。你在這裡的工作是在威士忌被包裝之前將其拍攝。

Fire and Forget 2 (Europe).name: Fire And Forget 2
Fire and Forget 2 (Europe).original_desc: Fire & Forget II is a 1990 futuristic racing-shooting video game developed by Titus Arcade and published by Sega for the Master System, and by Amstrad for the GX4000. It is the sequel to Fire and Forget, which was developed by Titus France SA for a number of platforms including the ZX Spectrum. Fire & Forget II is one of a number of similar games which emerged in the late 1980s and early 1990s in the wake of Sega's popular arcade driving game Out Run (1986). It is notable for the variety of its enemy sprites, and for its use of parallax scrolling. It is also notable for being one of the first video games to be launched simultaneously on two consoles.
Fire and Forget 2 (Europe).desc: Fire & Forget II 是一款 1990 年的未來派賽車射擊視頻遊戲，由 Titus Arcade 開發，由 Sega 為 Master System 發行，由 Amstrad 為 GX4000 發行。它是 Fire and Forget 的續作，由 Titus France SA 為包括 ZX Spectrum 在內的多個平台開發。Fire & Forget II 是 20 世紀 80 年代末和 90 年代初繼 Sega 流行的街機駕駛遊戲 Out Run（1986 年）之後出現的眾多類似遊戲之一。它以其敵人精靈的多樣性以及視差滾動的使用而聞名。它還值得注意的是，它是首批在兩個遊戲機上同時推出的視頻遊戲之一。

Klax (Europe).name: Klax
Klax (Europe).original_desc: An action/puzzle game, the object is to catch assorted color falling tiles and create rows, columns, or diagonals of a single color. Each level requires a different pattern to be made, and the tiles fall faster, more at a time, and in an increasing number
Klax (Europe).desc: 一款動作/益智遊戲，目標是捕捉各種顏色掉落的瓷磚並創建單一顏色的行、列或對角線。每個級別都需要製作不同的圖案，並且瓷磚掉落的速度更快，一次更多，而且數量越來越多

Mystical (Europe).name: Mystical
Mystical (Europe).original_desc: Acquiring the title of Supreme Magician, you should travel from the Marsh of Eternal Stench to the Garden of Eden, facing danger and humour, and trying to survive the deluge of monsters, thoroughly determined to stop you!  In this vertical scrolling actio
Mystical (Europe).desc: 獲得至尊魔法師的稱號，你要從永恆惡臭沼澤穿越到伊甸園，面對危險和幽默，在洪水氾濫的怪物中求生，堅決阻止你！在這個垂直滾動動作中

Navy Seals (Europe).name: Navy Seals
Navy Seals (Europe).original_desc: Like many of Ocean's games this was licensed from a film, in this case one by Orion, the company best known for Robocop.  You control a succession of the USA's elite fighters with the aim of destroying missiles held by terrorists. You must destroy the mis
Navy Seals (Europe).desc: 與 Ocean 的許多遊戲一樣，該遊戲是從一部電影獲得許可的，在本例中，該電影的授權者是 Orion，該公司以《機械戰警》而聞名。你控制一系列美國精銳戰鬥機，目標是摧毀恐怖分子持有的導彈。你必須摧毀錯誤

Operation Thunderbolt (Europe).name: Operation Thunderbolt
Operation Thunderbolt (Europe).original_desc: Operation Thunderbolt is the exciting sequel to Operation Wolf.  An airliner is hijacked by terrorists en-route from Paris to Boston, who threaten to kill all hostages on board if their mates aren't released from jail. Instead of reaching its destination,
Operation Thunderbolt (Europe).desc: 雷霆行動是狼行動的精彩續集。一架客機在從巴黎飛往波士頓的途中被恐怖分子劫持，恐怖分子威脅說，如果不釋放他們的同伴，就會殺死機上的所有人質。而不是到達目的地，

Pang (Europe).name: Pang
Pang (Europe).original_desc: Pang is a platform game which consists of 50 levels in total. It can be played with one or two players on the same screen, and the other player can join anytime within the game. Your goal is to destroy the balloons which bounce around the playfield. To ac
Pang (Europe).desc: Pang是一款平台遊戲，共有50個關卡。它可以與一個或兩個玩家在同一屏幕上玩，而另一個玩家可以在遊戲中隨時加入。您的目標是摧毀在操場上彈跳的氣球。至交流

Panza Kick Boxing (Europe).name: Panza Kick Boxing
Panza Kick Boxing (Europe).original_desc: Endorsed by AndrÃ© Panza, this video game adaptation of Thai kick boxing features over 35 moves. Use the training gym to build up your character's abilities until you feel ready to take on an opponent. You also have the ability to customize your attacks.
Panza Kick Boxing (Europe).desc: 這款改編自泰式拳擊的視頻遊戲得到了 André Panza 的認可，擁有超過 35 個動作。使用訓練館來增強角色的能力，直到您準備好與對手較量為止。您還可以自定義攻擊。

Plotting (Europe).name: Plotting
Plotting (Europe).original_desc: Plotting involves several different types of blocks, bearing symbols such as squares, circles and crosses. Using a small yellow object to direct a block across onto a particular section of a shaped wall. It will then rebound onto a set of blocks at a part
Plotting (Europe).desc: 繪圖涉及幾種不同類型的塊，帶有正方形、圓形和十字形等符號。使用黃色小物體將方塊引導到成形牆的特定部分上。然後它會反彈到某個部分的一組塊上

Pro Tennis Tour (Europe).name: Pro Tennis Tour
Pro Tennis Tour (Europe).original_desc: Okay Tennis Ace, now's your chance to compete with the best. Step into center court, tighten your grip and prepare to serve up your best shot. Pro Tennis Tour is about to begin.
Pro Tennis Tour (Europe).desc: 好的，網球王牌，現在你有機會與最優秀的選手競爭。步入中心球場，握緊握桿，準備好打出最佳擊球。職業網球巡迴賽即將開始。

Robocop 2 (Europe).name: Robocop 2
Robocop 2 (Europe).original_desc: RoboCop 2 is a mission-based platform game. Missions have various objectives, such as destroying nukes or killing all the enemies. If you didn't destroy/kill enough, you'll be transported to a training mission, which is a first-person perspective shoot 'e
Robocop 2 (Europe).desc: 《機械戰警 2》是一款基於任務的平台遊戲。任務有不同的目標，例如摧毀核武器或殺死所有敵人。如果你沒有摧毀/殺死足夠多的人，你就會被傳送到一個訓練任務，這是一個第一人稱視角的射擊遊戲

Skeet Shoot (Europe).name: Skeet Shoot
Skeet Shoot (Europe).original_desc: Using the Amstrad GX4000â€™s lightgun â€“ and yes, there was one actually available for the princely sum of Â£30 â€“ you could play Skeet Shoot (and pick up Enforcer later, had you some spare cash knocking around).  Predictably, Skeet Shoot was a bloodles
Skeet Shoot (Europe).desc: 使用 Amstrad GX4000 的光槍——是的，實際上有一款售價 30 英鎊——你可以玩雙向飛碟射擊（如果你有閒錢的話，稍後可以玩 Enforcer）。不出所料，雙向飛碟射擊是一場血戰

Super Pinball Magic (Europe).name: Super Pinball Magic
Super Pinball Magic (Europe).original_desc: This super pinball simulation will really make you "tilt" with pleasure! With its 12 levels, some of which are break outs, with plenty of bonuses and extra balls.
Super Pinball Magic (Europe).desc: 這個超級彈球模擬真的會讓你“傾斜”的快感！共有 12 個關卡，其中一些關卡是突破關卡，並提供大量獎金和額外的球。

Switchblade (Europe).name: Switchblade
Switchblade (Europe).original_desc: The Fireblade, sacred symbol of the ancient Switchblade clan, has been smashed into 16 pieces by the evil Havoc - but they say that a Hiro can save it, and as Hiro, you must retrieve the 16 pieces and restore your people's pride.  The gameplay is platform
Switchblade (Europe).desc: 火刃是古代 Switchblade 氏族的神聖像徵，已被邪惡的 Havoc 砸成 16 塊 - 但他們說 Hiro 可以拯救它，而作為 Hiro，你必須找回這 16 塊碎片並恢復你人民的驕傲。遊戲玩法是平台

Tennis Cup 2 (Europe).name: Tennis Cup 2
Tennis Cup 2 (Europe).original_desc: This tennis simulation recreates all the rules of the sport, from tie-breaks to break points. The action is viewed from behind one of the players, also featuring a split-screen option. You can play singles and doubles matches over 1,3 or 5 sets. There are
Tennis Cup 2 (Europe).desc: 這個網球模擬重現了這項運動的所有規則，從搶七到破發點。該動作是從一名玩家的後面觀看的，也具有分屏選項。您可以進行 1,3 或 5 盤的單打和雙打比賽。有

Tin Tin on the Moon (Europe).name: Tintin On The Moon
Tin Tin on the Moon (Europe).original_desc: Tintin on the Moon is a video game loosely based on the Destination Moon and Explorers on the Moon comic books from The Adventures of Tintin, the series by Belgian cartoonist Hergé. It is a first person shoot 'em up/side scroller and the first Tintin video game.
Tin Tin on the Moon (Europe).desc: 《丁丁在月球》是一款視頻遊戲，大致改編自比利時漫畫家埃爾熱創作的《丁丁歷險記》系列漫畫中的《目的地月球》和《月球探險家》。這是第一人稱射擊/橫向捲軸遊戲，也是第一款丁丁視頻遊戲。

Wild Streets (Europe).name: Wild Streets
Wild Streets (Europe).original_desc: Wild Streets is a side-scrolling arcade game, in which you fight enemies using punches, kicks, your gun and sometimes your panther will help you.
Wild Streets (Europe).desc: Wild Streets 是一款橫向捲軸街機遊戲，您可以使用拳擊、踢腿、槍來對抗敵人，有時您的黑豹也會幫助您。

World Of Sports (Europe).name: World Of Sports
World Of Sports (Europe).original_desc: World of Sports, is, as its name suggests, a sports game. These events were already present on computer versions of World Games, but if the game was renamed World of Sports on GX 4000 is simply that, we find here only 4 of the many events present on the original version.
World Of Sports (Europe).desc: 體育世界，顧名思義，是一款體育遊戲。這些賽事已經出現在 World Games 的計算機版本中，但如果遊戲在 GX 4000 上更名為 World of Sports，那麼我們在這裡發現的只是原始版本中出現的眾多賽事中的 4 個。
